subtitle: This stuffing for a roast chicken not only tastes delicious but makes a small bird go further

method.text: Heat half the oil in a pan. Fry onion until soft. Cool slightly. Transfer to a large bowl.
Add breadcrumbs, chestnuts, apricots, egg, sausagemeat and parsley to the bowl. Season to taste. Mix well.
Stuff both ends of the chicken with the stuffing. Place in a small roasting pan.
Roast in the oven for 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>1</sub> days or until juices run clear when the thickest part of the chicken is pierced with a skewer.

title: Chestnut stuffed chicken
